trustfund:
TF023590-NETHERLANDS -TAGPE-ENVIRONMENT,TF022983-SIDA CTF FOR ENVIRONMENT-ASIA,TF033291-PAKISTAN - PUNJAB FOREST SECTOR
            DEVELOPMENT PROJECT,TF022515-PHRD - AGRICULTURE
            ENVIRONMENT/FORESTRY II

abstracts.cdata!:
The Punjab Forest Sector Development
            Project will promote sustainable land use in rural areas of
            Punjab by redirecting public sector involvement towards the
            expansion of agro-forestry production systems and the
            rehabilitation of degraded range and scrub land. The project
            will inter alia support the following components: (a)
            institutional development; (b) farm forestry expansion; and
            (c) social range and scrub forest rehabilitation.
